video.title: Iron Man: Armored Adventures
video.synopsis: Teen phenom Tony Stark takes to the skies with an ingeniously engineered suit of armor to learn the truth about his father's mysterious death.

episodes.synopsis: Teen genius Tony Stark has just finished his greatest invention: the Iron Man armor. But before he gets to show his dad, Tony's world is shattered.
episodes.title: Iron, Forged in Fire: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tony believes that Obadiah Stane -- the man who has taken over Stark International -- may be behind the attack that took his father from him.
episodes.title: Iron, Forged in Fire: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Mandarin believes Tony Stark can find the missing Makluan Rings, so he plans to get close to him as his true identity -- 16-year-old Gene Khan.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man learns that Blizzard is also after Obadiah Stane. Despite Rhodey's doubts, Tony feels like he's found a kindred spirit in Blizzard.
episodes.title: Cold War

episodes.synopsis: Mister Fix targets Pepper Potts's FBI agent father. With her father now in the hospital, Pepper intends to find out who attacked him.
episodes.title: Whiplash

episodes.synopsis: An astronaut thought to be lost in space crashes down into the city -- alive, thanks to the environmental suit he was wearing: the Crimson Dynamo.
episodes.title: Iron Man vs. The Crimson Dynamo

episodes.synopsis: With the pressures of being both a normal teenager and Iron Man too much for him, Tony drops out of school to focus on saving the world full time.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: When Tony leaves behind his new Stealth Armor inside Stark International, Rhodey and Pepper help retrieve the armor before Iron Man's secret gets out.
episodes.title: Field Trip

episodes.synopsis: Tony and his friends' search for the ancient Makluan Rings goes awry when the guardians of the Rings, the Dreadknights, arrive.
episodes.title: Ancient History 101

episodes.synopsis: The Advanced Idea Mechanics approach Tony at the science fair. Offering up his help, Tony inadvertently creates a new enemy, the Controller.
episodes.title: Ready, A.I.M., Fire

episodes.synopsis: When Obadiah Stane starts acting strangely, Iron Man investigates. It turns out that Madame Masque was posing as Stane and has a new target: Iron Man.
episodes.title: Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: Project Pegasus captures Iron Man and begins analyzing the suit. After Rhodey and Pepper bust Iron Man out, Tony is ready to exact revenge.
episodes.title: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: While Tony and Gene argue over what to do with the third Makluan Ring, Gene accidentally unlocks the ring's guardian, Ultimo.
episodes.title: Hide and Seek

episodes.synopsis: Mister Fix infects Iron Man's suit with a deadly virus. When Iron Man goes online by itself, Tony is stuck inside the suit, unable to find a way out.
episodes.title: Man and Iron Man

episodes.synopsis: When Iron Man tracks Moses Magnum to A.I.M.'s secret headquarters, he meets someone else who's after Magnum -- the Black Panther.
episodes.title: Panther's Prey

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man steps in to save the Earth from the Living Laser. Soon, however, Nick Fury and S.H.I.E.L.D. contact Tony and tell him not to interfere.
episodes.title: Fun with Lasers

episodes.synopsis: Tony is forced to call on his friends for help when the Ghost captures Madame Masque.
episodes.title: Chasing Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: When Pepper gets caught up in the middle of a feud between the Tong and the Maggia, the Mandarin calls on an unlikely source for help -- Iron Man.
episodes.title: Pepper Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: Tony believes that the virus he's accidentally created is gone for good. Unfortunately, the virus grows bigger and sets its sights on Iron Man.
episodes.title: Technovore

episodes.synopsis: Firebrand, the guardian of the fourth Makluan Ring, traps Pepper and Rhodey inside an active volcano, and Iron Man must get them out before it erupts.
episodes.title: World on Fire

episodes.synopsis: When Iron Man proves no match against the mental powers of A.I.M.'s newest creation, it's up to the Living Laser to save his life.
episodes.title: Designed Only for Chaos

episodes.synopsis: The Iron Man suit accidently falls into the hands of Happy Hogan. Now, Tony must help Hogan take down a Maggia plot, while not revealing his secret.
episodes.title: Don't Worry, Be Happy

episodes.synopsis: The Controller uses a boy and the Hulk to take revenge on A.I.M. Stepping in, Iron Man is taken over by the Controller and only the Hulk can stop him.
episodes.title: Uncontrollable

episodes.synopsis: Obadiah Stane calls on Tony to find a cure for his daughter's disease. Knowing of a cure that exists in the Arctic, Iron Man heads off to find it.
episodes.title: Best Served Cold

episodes.synopsis: The mighty dragon Fin Fang Foom becomes quite a challenge for Tony and the gang when their captor, Zhang, releases it.
episodes.title: Tales of Suspense: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Rhodey arrives just in time to save his friends from Fin Fang Foom. Later, Iron Man and War Machine face off against Fin Fang Foom and the Mandarin.
episodes.title: Tales of Suspense: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Fix's mysterious new boss orders the abduction of Justin Hammer, so Mr. Fix releases the new and improved Whiplash 3.0 to complete the mission.
episodes.title: The Invincible Iron Man: Part 1: Disassembled

episodes.synopsis: With Stark International on the line, Tony (who is severely ill and injured) suits up in the all-new Mark 2 Iron Man armor to defeat his foes.
episodes.title: The Invincible Iron Man: Part 2: Reborn!

episodes.synopsis: When Mr. Fix rematerializes the Living Laser on Justin Hammer's orders, unexpected complications split him into two separate halves: Good and Evil.
episodes.title: Look into the Light

episodes.synopsis: To get his hands on the Iron Man armor, Obadiah Stane hires Ghost, who devises an intricate plot to locate the Armory and uncover Iron Man's identity.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: When Stane builds duplicates of the Iron Man armor, Tony must reveal them as frauds. But this causes the civilians to start hating Tony.
episodes.title: Armor Wars

episodes.synopsis: Attacks on Hammer Multinational lead Tony to find that Stark International is involved in a civil war, and Black Panther is targeting Justin Hammer.
episodes.title: Line of Fire

episodes.synopsis: With Justin Hammer finally acquiring specs from the Iron Man armor, he presents his new creation -- Titanium Man -- to the military.
episodes.title: Titanium vs. Iron

episodes.synopsis: Obadiah Stane forms an unlikely partnership with Doctor Doom in a plot to claim the Iron Man armor. Yet Doctor Doom has plans of his own for Iron Man.
episodes.title: The Might of Doom

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man has to stop Hawkeye and Black Widow from stealing Stark International's UI Chip. As a result, Justin Hammer manages to steal it himself!
episodes.title: The Hawk and the Spider

episodes.synopsis: When Obadiah Stane completes the Iron Monger armor, Iron Man and War Machine pull together all their might in order to defeat him.
episodes.title: Enter: Iron Monger

episodes.synopsis: Black Widow returns, stealing from Nick Fury and the S.H.I.E.L.D. helicarrier. What will it cost young Iron Man to discover the Widow's secrets?
episodes.title: Fugitive of S.H.I.E.L.D

episodes.synopsis: Schoolmate Rhona turns Tomorrow Academy into a maze of traps for Tony and his schoolmates, while her twin brother Andy turns out to be lethal as well.
episodes.title: All the Best People Are Mad

episodes.synopsis: Obadiah is fired after ordering mass production of the Iron Monger armor in a deal with Ghost. Obadiah vows revenge on the Board of Directors.
episodes.title: Heavy Mettle

episodes.synopsis: Mandarin desperately needs Tony's help to claim the eighth Makluan ring. Tony refuses his offer until Mandarin enslaves him with one of the rings.
episodes.title: Mandarin's Quest

episodes.synopsis: During Iron Man's fight with Blizzard, Justin Hammer manages to buy Stark International. As Iron Man, Tony plans to expose Justin's true nature.
episodes.title: Hostile Takeover

episodes.synopsis: When S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Mallen is fired by Gen. Nick Fury, Mallen takes the Extremis super-serum and mutates into a powerful maniac bent on revenge.
episodes.title: Extremis

episodes.synopsis: Tony's new friend Annie turns out to be a mutant on the run from Magneto! Iron Man tries to protect her, but how can he fight Magneto's metal mastery?
episodes.title: The X-Factor

episodes.synopsis: In the future, Tony Stark's grandson Andros is Iron Man 2099. However, his super-armor isn't designed to save the day -- it's to eliminate Tony Stark!
episodes.title: Iron Man 2099

episodes.synopsis: Seeking revenge, the Controller has created an elaborate scheme to mass-enslave the city via a new virtual technology called the Mainframe.
episodes.title: Control-Alt-Delete

episodes.synopsis: A broken and beaten Mandarin teleports into the Armory and tells Tony Stark something horrifying: Doctor Doom has found the ninth ring.
episodes.title: Doomsday

episodes.synopsis: Howard Stark is alive, and the media goes into a frenzy. The public wants Howard returned to his position as CEO, but of course Justin Hammer refuses.
episodes.title: The Hammer Falls

episodes.synopsis: Stunned to see Howard alive, Bruce Banner has renewed hope. Now that Howard's back, he can help Bruce to rid himself of a secret curse.
episodes.title: Rage of the Hulk

episodes.synopsis: Tony is desperate to find Obadiah, but before he can, weird things start happening. The Monger armor is stolen, and Howard is hit with a poison dart.
episodes.title: Iron Monger Lives!

episodes.synopsis: Tony gives Pepper her own suit of armor! Iron Man, War Machine and Rescue plan to fight Mandarin, but before they can, the Alien Guardian is awakened.
episodes.title: The Dragonseed

episodes.synopsis: Having found all 10 rings, the Mandarin hovers above New York, announcing on television that he is the one who shall unite the world under him.
episodes.title: The Makluan Invasion: Part 1: Annihilate!

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man, War Machine, and Rescue scramble to unite Nick Fury, Hawkeye, the Hulk, Black Panther and Black Widow together to battle the Makluans.
episodes.title: The Makluan Invasion: Part 2: Unite!
